statements: SELECT * FROM production_efficiency;
SELECT product_name, production_date, efficiency_rating FROM production_efficiency ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, production_time FROM production_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM production_efficiency WHERE product_name = 'ProductABC';
SELECT id, bottleneck_description FROM production_efficiency WHERE bottleneck_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, SUM(efficiency_rating) as total_efficiency FROM production_efficiency GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 5 ORDER BY total_efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, bottleneck_description FROM production_efficiency WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, AVG(efficiency_rating) as avg_rating FROM production_efficiency GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_efficiency WHERE bottleneck_description IS NOT NULL AND efficiency_rating <= 4.0 ORDER BY production_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcess;
SELECT process_name, product_name FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT process_name, product_name FROM ManufacturingProcess ORDER BY process_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BottleneckAnalysis WHERE bottleneck_status = 'Pending';
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE product_name LIKE '%product%';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT process_name, product_name FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, bottleneck_description FROM BottleneckAnalysis WHERE bottleneck_status = 'Active' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, product_name FROM ManufacturingProcess JOIN BottleneckAnalysis ON ManufacturingProcess.process_id = BottleneckAnalysis.process_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ManufacturingProcess GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, product_name, production_date, production_time, efficiency_score FROM production_efficiency_analysis
SELECT product_name, production_date, efficiency_score FROM production_efficiency_analysis ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT * FROM bottleneck_identification WHERE bottleneck_type = 'bottleneck'
SELECT product_id, process_step, step_duration FROM manufacturing_process WHERE step_status = 'in_progress'
SELECT id, product_id, bottleneck_type, bottleneck_description FROM bottleneck_identification ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM production_efficiency_analysis WHERE efficiency_score > 80 ORDER BY production_date ASC, production_time DESC
SELECT product_name, AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_efficiency FROM production_efficiency_analysis GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_efficiency > 75
SELECT * FROM bottleneck_identification WHERE bottleneck_type = 'Equipment Failure' AND (start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31')
SELECT product_name, process_step, step_duration FROM manufacturing_process WHERE step_status = 'pending' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_steps FROM manufacturing_process GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_steps >= 5 ORDER BY total_steps DESC, product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM production_line;
SELECT production_line_id, production_date, product_id FROM production_line ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_line_id, quantity, efficiency_rating FROM production_line WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_errors WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT production_line_id, task_description, task_status FROM production_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM production_line ORDER BY production_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT production_line_id, product_id, efficiency_rating FROM production_line WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM production_errors WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC;
SELECT bottleneck_description, bottleneck_timestamp FROM production_bottlenecks WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM production_tasks WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' AND end_time > '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities;
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM ManufacturingFacilities ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT location, facility_name FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLines WHERE facility_id = 2 ORDER BY line_capacity ASC;
SELECT line_name, line_capacity, facility_name FROM ProductionLines JOIN ManufacturingFacilities ON ProductionLines.facility_id = ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingFacilities WHERE production_capacity > 500 ORDER BY facility_name DESC

SELECT facility_name, location, production_capacity FROM ManufacturingFacilities INNER JOIN ProductionLines ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = ProductionLines.facility_id WHERE line_capacity < 1000

SELECT facility_name, location, SUM(production_output) AS total_output FROM ManufacturingFacilities INNER JOIN ProductionLines ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = ProductionLines.facility_id INNER JOIN ProductionLogs ON ProductionLines.line_id = ProductionLogs.line_id GROUP BY facility_id

SELECT ManufacturingFacilities.facility_name, ProductionLines.line_name, ProductionLogs.production_output FROM ManufacturingFacilities INNER JOIN ProductionLines ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = ProductionLines.facility_id INNER JOIN ProductionLogs ON ProductionLines.line_id = ProductionLogs.line_id WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT facility_name, COUNT(maintenance_id) AS total_maintenance FROM ManufacturingFacilities INNER JOIN ProductionLines ON ManufacturingFacilities.facility_id = ProductionLines.facility_id INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON ProductionLines.line_id = MaintenanceLogs.line_id GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_maintenance > 5
